cause.description:
for people who arent necessarily addicted enough to lose everything they own but enjoy simple minded gambling of those darn slot machines. the kind of people that talk too,rub, try all sorts of hexes and luck sayings trying to win some cash but still have fun wasting that SPARE 100 bucks looking for a winfall, lets share stories
1. theres lots of us that enjoy taking the chance of that lucky spin
cause.mission: to relieve stress in the hopes of winning some joy moneylol
cause.name: casino addicts
